personal.name: Zakaria Bounou
personal.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
personal.bio: I'm passionate about solving complex problems with analytical thinking and result-oriented development. I specialize in building scalable web applications across the full stack, from backend systems to modern frontends, with a focus on delivering high-performance solutions under tight deadlines.

about.summary: I build enterprise-grade applications with expertise across Java, PHP, Python, and modern JavaScript frameworks. My engineering approach combines robust backend architecture with intuitive frontend experiences, always optimizing for performance and maintainability.
highlights: Full-stack development with Spring Boot, Laravel, and React ecosystems
API design and integration (REST, SOAP, JWT authentication)
CI/CD implementation with Docker, Jenkins, and Git workflows
Database design and optimization (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, NoSQL)

experience.description: Leading project management initiatives covering diverse operational aspects of the company's systems.
responsibilities: Design and develop enterprise applications using Laravel and SQL Server
Maintain legacy PowerBuilder systems while modernizing architecture
Build REST APIs and integrate third-party services
Optimize existing systems for performance and scalability
Develop mobile applications with React Native
Implement automation scripts using Python, Bash, and Batch

experience.position: Développeur Spring Boot – Stage Fin d'Études
experience.description: Developed a comprehensive fleet management application covering the entire project lifecycle from requirements to deployment.
responsibilities: Architected and implemented RESTful APIs with Spring Boot
Designed relational database schemas with PostgreSQL
Built secure authentication system with JWT tokens
Developed responsive frontend interfaces using Angular and Thymeleaf
Set up CI/CD pipelines with Docker and Jenkins
Applied Spring Data JPA for efficient data persistence

experience.description: Developed a patient records management system using Symfony framework.
responsibilities: Built MVC architecture with Symfony components
Designed MySQL database for patient data management
Implemented CRUD operations with Doctrine ORM
Created responsive UI with Bootstrap framework
Managed dependencies with Composer

experience.description: Enhanced internal management system by refactoring existing modules and automating recurring tasks.
responsibilities: Refactored legacy modules using Spring Framework
Automated repetitive workflows to improve efficiency
Wrote unit tests with JUnit for code reliability
Managed project dependencies with Maven

achievements.title: Trophée d'Excellence - COP28 Dubai
achievements.description: Excellence award for incubated project at COP28 international climate conference in Dubai

achievements.title: 2ème Prix - Bootcamp des Start-ups Vertes
achievements.description: Second place winner in Green Startups Bootcamp competition

achievements.title: 3ème Prix - UPF National Robotics Competition
